â
'''Natseven TV Sdn Bhd''' or better known as '''ntv7''' is a [[terrestrial television]] channel in [[Malaysia]] for launched terrestrial based in [[Kuala Lumpur]] (a national capital of [[Malaysia]]). It was officially launched it started began broadcasting nationwide on [[7 April]] [[1998]] event as durated to look for the crescent moon to mark the national and state public holiday beginning of [[Islamic calendar|Muslim month]] of [[Dhu al-Hijjah|Dzulhijjah]] to celebrate '''Hari Raya Haji''' (or '''[[Aidiladha|Hari Raya Aidiladha]]''') (known in [[Arabic language|Arabic]] as '''[[Eid ul-Adha]]''') Eid al-Adha is celebrated annually on the 10th day of the month of [[Dhu al-Hijjah|Dzulhijjah]] since [[1998|1418]] [[Islamic calendar|Hijjriyah]] of the lunar [[Islamic calendar]]. Eid al-Adha celebrations start after the [[Hajj]], the annual pilgrimage to [[Mecca]] in [[Saudi Arabia]] by Muslims worldwide, descend from [[Mount Arafat]]<ref> [http://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=x8G803Bi31IC&dat=19980407&printsec=frontpage1dq=television&hl=en Ntv7's first day launched started day]. ''[[New Straits Times]]''. April 7, 1998. Reterived 2010-02-16. </ref><ref> [http://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=x8G803Bi31IC&dat=19980407&printsec=frontpage1dq=television&hl=en Ntv7's first day schedule]. ''[[New Straits Times]]''. April 7, 1998. Reterived 2010-02-16. </ref> or based regional in [[Klang Valley]] (the broadcasting area surrounding [[Kuala Lumpur]] (a national capital of [[Malaysia]])). Its mission is to promote a happier and more enlightened [[Malaysia]]. Believing strongly in the provision of wholesome [[entertainment]], good family and community values, good corporate citizenship, and the promotion of national integration, the station works on an appointment-based programming concept reflecting its philosophy of being "'''Saluran Ceria Anda'''".
+
'''Natseven TV Sdn Bhd''' or better known as '''ntv7''' is a [[terrestrial television]] channel in [[Malaysia]]. It was launched nationwide on 7 April 1998. Its mission is to promote a happier and more enlightened [[Malaysia]]. Believing strongly in the provision of wholesome [[entertainment]], good family and community values, good corporate citizenship, and the promotion of national integration, the station works on an appointment-based programming concept reflecting its philosophy of being '''Saluran Ceria Anda''' ("''Your Feel Good Channel''", â''æ¨çæ­¡æ¨é »é''â).
== Background ==
== Background ==
Line 28: Line 24:
The appointment-based concept is also new to the Malaysian broadcasting industry, where factors, such as who watches what and when, define when a programme is slotted in the TV schedule. The Station, which broadcasts on the UHF frequency band offers a combination of [[Malay language|Malay]], [[English language|English]], and [[Chinese language|Chinese]] programmes, produced locally as well as some from overseas.
The appointment-based concept is also new to the Malaysian broadcasting industry, where factors, such as who watches what and when, define when a programme is slotted in the TV schedule. The Station, which broadcasts on the UHF frequency band offers a combination of [[Malay language|Malay]], [[English language|English]], and [[Chinese language|Chinese]] programmes, produced locally as well as some from overseas.
â
Offering a wide variety of programming, ntv7's line-up includes dramas sinetron, situational comedies ([[Situation comedy|sitcoms]]), entertainment programmes, [[game show]]s, children programmes, [[anime]], and [[Film|movies]]. In addition, there are also the station's news bulletins in Malay, English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Taiwanese which aim to be independent and relevant at all times.
+
Offering a wide variety of programming, ntv7's line-up includes dramas, situational comedies ([[Situation comedy|sitcoms]]), entertainment programmes, [[game show]]s, children programmes, [[anime]], and [[Film|movies]]. In addition, there are also the station's news bulletins in Malay, English and Mandarin which aim to be independent and relevant at all times.
== History ==
== History ==
â
ntv7 was started planning for [[television]] transmission since on Wednesday, [[31 December]] [[1997]] event as durated to look for the crescent moon to mark the beginning of [[Islamic calendar|Muslim month]] of [[Ramadhan]] to celebrate [[Sawm|fasting month]] of [[Ramadhan]] plays at '''Start of Ramadhan''' ('''Libur Awal Mulai Ramadhan Puasa''') based in [[Kuala Lumpur]].
+
After being in operation since 7 April 1998, ntv7 is proud of its achievement in building a strong following amongst Malaysian television audiences. So much so that the public's perception is that the Station has been around for much longer than this. Broadcast signals go through a network of 10 transmitters dotted around the country. Daily transmission begins at 7:00 am until 1:00 am the next day.
â
ntv7 was started for [[television]] test of transmission began since on Friday, [[7 March]] [[1998]] at 20:00 pm tonight ([[UTC+08:00]] - [[Time in Malaysia|Malaysia Standard Time]]) local time based in [[Kuala Lumpur]] new test of transmission place started building media television broadcasting relay network studios stations based in [[Kuala Lumpur]] and [[Shah Alam]] (a state capital of [[Selangor]]); area places based in [[Klang Valley]] the area states has : [[Petaling Jaya]], [[Putrajaya]], [[Subang Jaya]], [[Sepang]], [[Cyberjaya|Cyber Jaya]], [[Kuala Lumpur]] and [[Shah Alam]].
+
In October 2005, [[Media Prima Berhad]] announced its acquisition of ntv7. Media Prima also owns 3 other private TV stations in Malaysia - [[TV3 (Malaysia)|TV3]], [[8TV (Malaysia)|8TV]] & [[TV9 (Malaysia)|TV9]] as well as a controlling stake in [[New Straits Times|The New Straits Times Press (Malaysia) Bhd]].
â
The following illustrates part of a typical day's broadcasting on ntv7 on Friday, [[7 March]] [[1998]]:
+
The acquisition of ntv7 by MPB was completed on 30 December 2005 and repositioned the station as a preferred channel among the affluent urban family households. This was complemented by the introduction of a new vibrant logo in July 2006 that reaffirmed ntv7's aim to provide superior and quality content to its discerning viewers. ntv7 is targeted towards the urban and English speaking viewers.In 2009, ntv7's refreshing content of wholesome family, entertainment, current affair and sport programmes hit the right chord with the Chinese and Urban audiences
â
* '''19:00''' - [[Test card]]
+
ntv7 currently broadcasts under [[UHF]] (Ultra High) Frequency. A [[VHF]] (Very High) Frequency transmission is also available in the Klang Valley on Channel 7. In the [[Klang Valley]], the UHF channel is 37.

ntv7 was programmes since on Tuesday, [[7 April]] [[1998]] event as durated to look for the crescent moon to mark the national and state public holiday beginning of [[Islamic calendar|Muslim month]] of [[Dhu al-Hijjah|Dzulhijjah]] to celebrate '''Hari Raya Haji''' (or '''[[Aidiladha|Hari Raya Aidiladha]]''') (known in [[Arabic language|Arabic]] as '''[[Eid ul-Adha]]''') Eid al-Adha is celebrated annually on the 10th day of the month of [[Dhu al-Hijjah|Dzulhijjah]] since [[1998|1418]] [[Islamic calendar|Hijjriyah]] of the lunar [[Islamic calendar]]. Eid al-Adha celebrations start after the [[Hajj]], the annual pilgrimage to [[Mecca]] in [[Saudi Arabia]] by Muslims worldwide, descend from [[Mount Arafat]] at 08:00 am (morning breakfast early began known as "'''Good Morning'''") ([[UTC+08:00]] - [[Time in Malaysia|Malaysia Standard Time]]) local time based in [[Kuala Lumpur]] officially was innaugurated by [[Zahir Mosque|KH Zainuddin MZ]]
  â   â
ntv7 was officially launched grand oepened innaugurated new operated renovated completed it started began broadcasting operated in the [[Klang Valley]] (the broadcasting area surrounding [[Kuala Lumpur]] (a national capital of [[Malaysia]])) since on every last night form overnight an tonight date on Tuesday, [[7 April]] [[1998]] at 20.30 pm tonight ([[UTC+08:00]] - [[Time in Malaysia|Malaysia Standard Time]]) local time was officially innaugurated by the [[Prime Minister of Malaysia]] [[w:id:Cinta Fitri|Farrel]] ([[w:id:Teuku Wisnu|Teuku Wisnu]]) for parliament prime minister place at [[Stadium Merdeka]] (was independence day) and [[Malaysian Houses of Parliament]] (was officialy innaugurated) form into collabate at [[Flag of Malaysia|Malaysia National Flag]]-[[Flag of the Federal Territory|Federal Territory State Flag]]-[[Flag of Kuala Lumpur|Kuala Lumpur State Flag]] form opened at written pen formal head master hand sign commonwealth information services based in [[Kuala Lumpur]] live television broadcasting at news bulletin actual coverage journal telegram report direct information affairs broadcasting network segment breaking news update durated events successfull televisions house form studios broadcasting stage center. It named [[Ntv7|Airin Zainul]] as the Chief Commissioner and President Director formal Ntv7 is also the first [[Malaysia|Malaysian]] [[Television]] company that have been inaugurated by the [[Prime Minister of Malaysia]] himself<ref> [http://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=x8G803Bi31IC&dat=19980407&printsec=frontpage1dq=television&hl=en Ntv7's first day launched started day]. ''[[New Straits Times]]''. April 7, 1998. Reterived 2010-02-16. </ref><ref> [http://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=x8G803Bi31IC&dat=19980407&printsec=frontpage1dq=television&hldq=television&hl=en Ntv7's first day schedule]. ''[[New Straits Times]]''. April 7, 1998. Reterived 2010-02-16. </ref>, ntv7 is proud of its achievement in building a strong following amongst [[Malaysia|Malaysian]] television audiences. So much so that the public's perception is that the Station has been around for much longer than this. Broadcast signals go through a network of 10 transmitters dotted around the country. Daily transmission begins at 8:00 am until 12:00 am the next day.
  â   â
The following illustrates part of a typical day's broadcasting on ntv7 on Tuesday, [[7 April]] [[1998]] (special [[Public holiday]] based in [[Malaysia]] at [[Muslim holidays]] began form [[Public holidays in Malaysia]] has '''[[Aidiladha|Hari Raya Haji]]''' (or '''[[Aidiladha|Hari Raya Aidiladha]]''') (known in [[Arabic language|Arabic]] as '''[[Eid ul-Adha]]''') begins date of 10th [[Dhu al-Hijjah]] [[Islamic calendar|1418 H]] [[Islamic calendar]]/[[Islamic New Year]] is observed by Muslims on the [[hajj]] and around the world in commemoration of [[Ibrahim]]'s willingness to sacrifice his son for [[Allah]] formal live at [[Kaaba]] placed form [[Masjid al-Haram]] city based in [[Mecca]], [[Saudi Arabia]] at 08:00 am):

In [[1 January]] [[2002]] [[Media Prima Berhad]] announced its acquisition of ntv7. Media Prima also owns 3 other private television stations in [[Malaysia]] has : [[TV3 (Malaysia)|TV3]], [[8TV (Malaysia)|8TV]] & [[TV9 (Malaysia)|TV9]] as well as a controlling stake in [[New Straits Times]] owner by [[New Straits Times Press|New Straits Times Press (Malaysia) Sdn Bhd]].
  â   â
ntv7 currently broadcasts under [[UHF]] (Ultra High) Frequency. A [[VHF]] (Very High) Frequency transmission is also available in the [[Klang Valley]] based in [[Kuala Lumpur]] (a national capital of [[Malaysia]]) on Channel 7. In the [[Klang Valley]], the UHF channel is 37.
 
ntv7 is also available over [[Astro (satellite TV)|Astro]] on Channel 107.
ntv7 is also available over [[Astro (satellite TV)|Astro]] on Channel 107.
â
==Primetime programmes==
+
==Criticism and controversy==
â
{{see also|List of programmes broadcasted by ntv7}}
+
NTV7 has been criticized in the past for not taking certain programming seriously and even taking some programs off-the-air without letting it finish the season run.
â
Dramas are in '''<font color="33CCFF">blue</font>'''; variety programmes are in '''<font color="EEDC82">flax</font>'''; movies and/or specials are in '''<font color="EF9B0F">gamboge</font>'''; reality shows are in '''<font color="FFCC00">orange</font>'''; serial soap dramas are in '''<font color="FBEC5D">corn</font>'''; comedies are in '''<font color="00FF00">green</font>'''
  â
ntv7's primetime programmes as of August, 2010.
+
